short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome plugin for colouring Zenhub issues to enhance it to be used as a digital kanban.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a plugin to colour issues that are listed using Zenhub boards or workspace. It also provide users with a toggle to hide the Zenhub side bar to improve its visual presentation. Therefore, the Zenhub boards or workspace can be used as a digital Kanban by Agile teams.

This plugin only works for IBM enterprise Github users in the current release. You also need the Zenhub plugin as a pre-req.
